description:
Our vision parallels the Twin Rivers Unified District vision, which is to maintain an unwavering focus on powerful and engaging learning experiences that prepare students for college, career, and life successes. We take great pride in having strong home-to-school partnerships, recognizing that they are crucial to our success.

We aim to develop long-term partnerships with our parents and community through consistent, open, and clear communication. This allows us to work together to provide support and resources to best meet the needs of our students. Our success is a direct reflection of the partnerships established among the students, staff and community.

All staff members are committed to the success of our students and providing them with educational experiences and opportunities to ensure that they are prepared for college, career, and life successes.Â
